mapper.insert: insert into order_goods (orderGoodsNum, goodsNum, orderNum, goodsQntt, openDay) values(#{orderGoodsNum},#{goodsNum},#{orderNum},#{goodsQntt},#{openDay})
mapper.select: select orderGoodsNum, goodsNum, orderNum, goodsQntt, openDay from order_goods Where orderGoodsNum=#{orderGoodsNum}
select orderGoodsNum, goodsNum, orderNum, goodsQntt, openDay from order_goods where orderGoodsNum > 0 order by orderGoodsNum desc
